title: Transparency
description: We are committed to act transparently in accordance with laws & regulations, provide accurate public disclosure of our finances and assure vou that vour capital is being used responsibly.

title: Humility
description: This is our source of strength. We do not seek credit or publicize our work unless it is necessary to fulfill our mission.

title: Integrity
description: We aspire to live to the highest levels of professional and ethical standards and not compromise on our reputation. We will act in the best interest of our beneficiaries and donors.

title: Respect
description: We are committed to treating the people and organizations with whom we work with fairness, dignity and respect.

title: Urgency
description: People are dying unnecessarily due to a variety of health reasons that are preventable. We recognize that every day we delay, we lose more people. The faster we act, the more lives we can save.

title: Passion
description: We are passionate & enthusiastic about making a significant positive change by inspiring people to give to create a better world.
